citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30pm on August
22nd, 2023. On arrival for inspection, inspectors spoke with another resident at registrant's address who stated that the
registrant was not home. Spoke with registrant by phone who confirmed that he was not home and unavailable for
inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
TONYA HADJISEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
